name: Futari no Fantavision
summary: Upgrade to Sony Computer Entertainment's puzzle action launch title for PlayStation 2. While the gameplay largely remains the same, the developers added changed rules, item upgrades, and a new battle dynamics to the title. Futari no Fantavision translates to "Fantavision for Two" -- which sums up the game quite nicely. In addition to the versus battles, this Japanese special release also adds a changed single-player mode, new fireworks effects, better graphics, and a completely remixed soundtrack.
